CSS Layout with Grid

Grid is a powerful tool for creating layouts in CSS. It allows you to create a responsive and flexible layout that works on any device.

Example

Column 1
Column 2
Column 3

Exercise

Create a grid layout with 2 columns and 3 rows. Use different background colors for each cell.

Row 1, Column 1
Row 1, Column 2
Row 2, Column 1
Row 2, Column 2
Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1
Row 3, Column 2
Row 3, Column 3
